beer.beer_description:
Sometimes a beer comes together like a landscape.
Two breweries, oceans apart but close at heart, came together when a quick call turned a chance idea into a joyful collaboration.
Start with a bright, golden canvas. Drop in some happy little hops, let them wander
A touch of pine here, a flicker of citrus there. And if one shines a little brighter, that's alright.
There are no mistakes here.
Just hoppy li' accidents

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 185 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 38!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 25 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 6!

user.bio: Trying to drink as many new beers as possible...

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 145 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 30!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 280 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 57! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 15 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 4!
